isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION WITH WTEC III ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - DESCRIPTION - TWO-SPEED AXLES

svcproc.title: TWO-SPEED AXLES
svcproc.para: Two-speed axles are available for use along with the Allison WT transmission. An electrical connection with the transmission controller prevents the axle from shifting, after the driver has requested a shift until the transmission output speed is within a preprogrammed range. Both air and electrically shifted systems are available.
